pcr.pcr_reference: PCR 2019:14 Construction products (EN 15804:A2); Version 1.3.4; 2024-04-30 and c-PCR-001 Cement and Building Lime (EN 16908:2019); 2024-04-30

pcr.review_chair: Claudia A. Peña, University of Concepción, Chile

product_description.product_category: Portland cement, aluminous cement, slag cement and similar hydraulic cements, except in the form of clinkers
product_description.declared_unit: One ton (1,000 kg) of product ready to be sent to the customer
product_description.packaging: Product marketed in bulk, no packaging materials
product_description.hazardous_substances: No substances listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern (SVHC) used above 0.1% by weight

lca_information.declared_unit: One ton (1,000 kg) of ECOPlanet CEM V/A (Q-S) 42.5 N manufactured by Holcim España in Sagunto, marketed in bulk, ready to send to customers
lca_information.reference_service_life: Not relevant due to cradle-to-gate boundary conditions
lca_information.system_boundaries: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) including quarry works, component manufacturing, transport of materials and fuels, factory process and final preparation; excludes modules B1 to D
excluded_processes: Manufacture of equipment, buildings, or capital goods
Transport of people to and inside manufacturing plants
lca_information.electricity_mix: 100% renewable sources with Climate Change impact of 0.079 kg CO2e/kWh (GWP100-GHG)
lca_information.data_quality: High; data representative of declared geographical scope, recent data, third-party verified emissions
lca_information.cut_off_rules: At least 95% of total input flows (mass and energy) per module included; expanded cut-off rule of ISO 21930 applied
lca_information.allocation: Only for verified direct emissions of furnace clinker production
lca_information.transport_included: All transportation and components included with real loads and distances for 2023; port operations excluded

transport.details: Transport of raw materials by ship and truck included; distances provided by factory records; port operations excluded

end_of_life.information: Product physically integrated with other products during installation and cannot be physically separated at end of life; product undergoes physical-chemical transformation and is no longer identified at end of life; product does not contain biogenic carbon

carbon_emission_context.global_warming_potential_total: 380.85 kg CO2 equivalent per ton (net emissions)
carbon_emission_context.biogenic_carbon: Net near zero (biogenic carbon uptake and release balanced)

recycled_materials_handling.recycled_components_considered: From selection and processing plant of recovered materials

company_information.company_profile: Holcim España owns five cement factories in Spain with over seven million tons per year capacity, multiple concrete and mortar plants, terminals, and a waste recovery plant; employs over 700 people; part of Holcim global group focused on sustainable construction and net-zero strategy
company_information.sustainability_practices: Decarbonizing operations via recycling alternative fuels, offering low-carbon products, working towards zero net emissions built environment, positive impact on water and biodiversity
certifications: ISO 14064-1:2018 Greenhouse Gases Emissions Inventory verified annually
Carbon Footprint National Registry of Spain with 'Calculo' and 'Reduzco' labels

references: Registro Estatal de Emisiones y Fuentes Contaminantes (prtr-es.es)
additional_info.notes_on_comparability: EPDs within the same product category but from different programs may not be comparable unless based on the same PCR version, identical functions, system limits, data quality, cut-off rules, and impact assessment methods
